title: Farm Animal Sounds Song 0811 | Nursery Rhymes | Little Bunny Learns

tasks.task: Mimic animal sounds on a farm
subtasks: Identify the sound made by a pig (oink)
Identify the sound made by a hen (cluck)
Identify the sound made by a dog (woof)
Identify the sound made by a cat (meow)
Identify the sound made by a turkey (gobble)
Identify the sound made by a rooster (cock-a-doodle-doo)
Identify the sound made by a donkey (yee-haw)
Identify the sound made by a goose (honk)
Identify the sound made by a rabbit (thump)
Identify the sound made by an owl (hoot)
Identify the sound made by a frog (ribbit)
Identify the sound made by a bee (buzz)
Identify the sound made by a mouse (squeak)
Identify the sound made by a crow (coo)
Identify the sound made by a lamb (baa)
Identify the sound made by a pigeon (coo-coo-coo)
Identify the sound made by a bull (snort)
Identify the sound made by a calf (moo)
Identify the sound made by a chick (peep)
Identify the sound made by a llama (hum)
Identify the sound made by a dove (coo)
Identify the sound made by a pony (neigh)
Identify the sound made by a pheasant (chirp)
Identify the sound made by a quail (chirp)
Baa like a lamb
Oink like a pig
Cluck like a hen

tasks.task: Mimic animal sounds on a farm
subtasks: Identify and imitate the sound of a pig (oink)
Identify and imitate the sound of a hen (cluck)

tasks.task: Imitate sound of different farm animals
subtasks: Oink like a pig
Cluck like a hen
Bark like a dog

subtasks: Oink like a pig
